atk-abh03a17:2_2: Tattha ye arahattaṁ paṭijānantānaṁ appatte pattasaññīnaṁ adhimānikānaṁ kuhakānaṁ vā arahattaṁ paṭijānantānaṁ
atk-abh03a17:2_3: sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ disvā “mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṁ upasaṁharantī”ti maññanti;
atk-abh03a17:2_4: seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyā ca aparaseliyā ca;
atk-abh03a17:2_5: te sandhāya atthi arahatoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a17:2_7: Idāni yasmā sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hoti,
atk-abh03a17:2_8: tasmā atthi arahato rāgoti anuyogo āraddho.
atk-abh03a17:3_0: Mārakāyikā devatā attanotiādipañhe yasmā tāsaṁ devatānaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a17:4_0: Neva attanotipañhe pana nimminitvā upasaṁharantīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:4_1: Lomakūpehītipañhe sappitelānaṁ viya lomakūpehi upasaṁharaṇābhāvaṁ disvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:5_2: no”ti evaṁ vimatiṁ gāhayissāmāti evaṁ vacasāyaṁ katvā upasaṁharantīti attho.
atk-abh03a17:5_3: Atthi arahato vimatīti puṭṭho aṭṭhavatthukaṁ vicikicchaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a17:5_4: dutiyaṁ puṭṭho itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottādīsu sanniṭṭhānābhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:6_0: 309.Atthi tassa āsayoti tassa sukkassa uccārapassāvānaṁ viya patiṭṭhānokāso atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a17:10_3: Tattha yesaṁ “arahato itthipurisādīnaṁ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi aññāṇaṁ,
atk-abh03a17:10_5: Yasmā ca nesaṁ tāni vatthūni pare vitaranti pakāsenti ācikkhanti,
atk-abh03a17:10_6: tasmā nesaṁ atthi paravitaraṇā”ti imā laddhiyo,
atk-abh03a17:10_8: tesaṁ tā laddhiyo bhindituṁ tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a17:10_10: Tattha sabbesupi pañhesu ceva vissajjanesu ca pāḷiṁ anugantvāva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a17:13_2: Tattha yesaṁ “sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa dukkhanti vācā bhijjatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a17:13_4: te sandhāya samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a17:13_6: Puna sabbatthāti tayo bhave sandhāya puṭṭho arūpaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:13_7: Sabbadāti kālavasena puṭṭho paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe paṭhamajjhānikasamāpattito aññaṁ sabbaṁ samāpattikālaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:13_8: Sabbesaṁ samāpannānanti puṭṭho lokiyasamāpattiyo samāpanne sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:13_9: Sabbasamāpattīsūti puṭṭho dutiyajjhānādikaṁ lokuttaraṁ sabbañca lokiyasamāpattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:14_3: Evaṁ sante kasmā kāyabhedopi na hotī”ti codanatthaṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a17:14_4: Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a17:14_5: Idāni yadi so maggakkhaṇe “dukkha”nti vācaṁ bhāsati,
atk-abh03a17:14_8: itarampi na bhāseyyāti codanatthaṁ dukkhanti jānantotiādayo pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a17:14_9: Itaro pana attano laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a17:14_10: Lokuttaraṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ samāpanno dukkhadukkhanti vipassatīti hissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a17:16_0: 329.No vata re vattabbeti yadi avisesena yaṁkiñci samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo,
atk-abh03a17:16_5: tattha yena samāpatticittena so vacībhedo samuṭṭhito,
atk-abh03a17:19_2: Tattha “dukkhaṁ dukkhanti vācaṁ bhāsanto dukkhe ñāṇaṁ āharati,
atk-abh03a17:19_4: Tañca panetaṁ maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpanna”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a17:19_8: Ye kecīti paṭhamapañhe avipassake sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a17:22_2: Tattha yesaṁ samāpatticittañceva bhavaṅgacittañca anuppabandhena pavattamānaṁ disvā “ekameva cittaṁ ciraṁ
atk-abh03a17:22_3: tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi seyyathāpi etarahi heṭṭhā vuttappabhedānaṁ andhakānaṁ,
atk-abh03a17:22_7: Upaḍḍhadivaso uppādakkhaṇoti ettha ṭhitikkhaṇaṁ anāmasitvā “aniccā vata saṅkhārā,
atk-abh03a17:23_0: Te dhammā cittena lahuparivattāti puṭṭho cittato lahutaraparivattino dhamme apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:23_1: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yassa cittassa dīghaṭṭhitiṁ icchati,
atk-abh03a17:23_4: kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū”tiādivacanavasena āruppato aññatra paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a17:23_6: Muhuttaṁ muhuttaṁ uppajjatīti pañhe paravādissa “uppādavayadhammino”tiādisuttavirodhabhayena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:26_4: ādittaṁ sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”tiādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “nippariyāyeneva sabbe saṅkhārā kukkuḷā
atk-abh03a17:26_7: tesaṁ nānappakārasukhasandassanena taṁ laddhiṁ vivecetuṁ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a17:26_9: Tattha anodhiṁ katvāti odhiṁ mariyādaṁ koṭṭhāsaṁ akaritvā,
atk-abh03a17:26_11: Sesaṁ sabbaṁ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṁ saddhiṁ suttasādhanāyāti.
atk-abh03a17:29_0: 339. Idāni anupubbābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ –
atk-abh03a17:32_0: Ādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno ekacce kilese dukkhadassanena pajahati,
atk-abh03a17:32_2: tathā sesāpīti evaṁ soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi anupubbena kilesappahānaṁ katvā arahattapaṭilābho hotī”ti evarūpā nānābhisamayaladdhi uppannā,
atk-abh03a17:32_6: Anupubbena sotāpattimagganti puṭṭho pana ekassa maggassa bahubhāvāpattibhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:32_8: Tāni vā cattāripi ñāṇāni eko sotāpattimaggoyevāti paṭijānāti,
atk-abh03a17:33_0: 344.Magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti pañhe yasmā dukkhadassanādīhi dassanaṁ apariniṭṭhitaṁ,
atk-abh03a17:33_2: tadā so phale ṭhitoti saṅkhaṁ gacchati,
atk-abh03a17:34_2: Puna dukkhasaccaṁ cattāri saccānīti anuyoge catunnampi nānāsabhāvattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a17:35_1: samuddato ekabindussa rase paṭividdhe sesaudakassa paṭivedho viya ekadhamme aniccādito paṭividdhe sabbepi
atk-abh03a17:36_1: Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehīti sāvakānaṁ sādhāraṇehi saccañāṇehi ceva paṭisambhidāñāṇehi ca.
atk-abh03a17:36_7: aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṁ tattheva vuttañāṇehi.
atk-abh03a17:39_2: Tattha buddho bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena voharatīti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a17:40_0: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti ettha yadi so lokuttare paṭihaññeyya.
atk-abh03a17:40_2: Lokiye paṭihaññamānassa pana lokuttaratā nāma natthīti ayametthādhippāyo.
atk-abh03a17:40_7: Sabbe te maggaṁ bhāventīti pañhesu ye maggaṁ nappaṭilabhanti,
atk-abh03a17:42_2: Lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyoti ayampi ekā laddhi.
atk-abh03a17:45_2: Tattha yesaṁ appaṭisaṅkhānirodhañca paṭisaṅkhānirodhañca dvepi ekato katvā nirodhasaccanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a17:45_4: te sandhāya dve nirodhāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a17:45_6: Dve dukkhanirodhāti pañhesu yasmā dve dukkhasaccāni na icchati,
atk-abh03a17:45_10: Dve nirodhasaccānītipañhesu dvinnaṁ dukkhasaccānaṁ nirodhavasenaanicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:46_0: Atthi dvinnaṁ nibbānānantiādīsu pucchāsu uccanīcatādīni apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:47_0: Appaṭisaṅkhāniruddheti ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhā suddhapakatikattā vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṁ
atk-abh03a17:47_1: vā vasena na samudācaraṇato niruddhāti vuccanti,
atk-abh03a17:47_6: Tattha bhaggānaṁ puna abhañjanato appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhānaṁ vā ariyamagge uppanne tathā nirujjhanatova sakavādī accantabhaggataṁ paṭijānāti.
